string.text: Rail mount
Allows for the installation of various sights on the weapon.
Barrel bluing
Bluing the barrel results in higher resistance against the elements and other environmental hazards, increasing reliability.
Threaded suppressor mount
Threading the end of the barrel allows a suppressor to be mounted.
Improved ejector
Modification of the case ejector to make it slightly more efficient and reduce firing delays.
Rifled barrel
Rifling the barrel significantly improves accuracy and muzzle velocity, but prevents any further use of buckshot ammunition.
Lightweight alloy components
Replacing standard parts with lightweight alloys significantly reduces the weight of the gun.
Combined tactical module
Combines the functions of a narrow-field tactical flashlight and laser sight. Particularly useful in low-light conditions.
Polymer drum
Replacing the drum with a lightweight polymer alternative reduces the overall weight of the gun slightly.
Tritium inserts
Installation of luminous night-sights allows for easier target acquisition in low-light conditions.
Protective coating
The application of a special coating to the moving components can significantly reduce the amount of wear they receive.
Folding buttstock
Installing a folding buttstock reduces the recoil felt when firing and makes the gun easier to control.
Recoil compensator
Adding a special polymer damper to the internal assembly slightly reduces the recoil generated by each firing cycle.
Lighter trigger
A lighter trigger pull results in faster and easier follow-up shots.
